# Guidelines

```{r install_examplePkgs, include=FALSE}
pkgs <- list.files(system.file("examplePkgs", package = "techguides"))
for (pkg in pkgs) {
  devtools::install(
    system.file("examplePkgs", pkg, package = "techguides")
  )
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
guides <- list.files(system.file("guidelines", package = "techguides"))
for (guide in guides) {
  guide_files <- list.files(system.file("guidelines", guide, package = "techguides"))
  for (guide_file in guide_files) {
     cat(
    knitr::knit_child(
      system.file("guidelines", guide, guide_file, package = "techguides"),
      quiet = TRUE
    ) 
  ) 
  }
}
```
